discord keeps on crashing when i get a notification .-.

I dont get the use of the Imperial Measurement system in scientific papers, documents and articles. Imperial is just not suitable for serious things, its overall cluncky and outdated. Its harder and unpreciser to convert Cubic feet into Gallons than Cubic Meters into Litres For metric, 1m^3 is exactly 1000 Liters easy peazy lemon squeezy. For Imperial, 1 cubic feet is 7.48 gallons, pretty complicated, not easy at all. There are nearly no connections between the things you measure Imperial. While in metric, 1dm^3 (one cubic decimeter) is the same as 1 litre and 1 litre can contain exactly kg of water. So use metric while talking science please, its a whole lot easier, trust me. Oh and dont forget about Kelvin! I dont have a big problem with Farenheit though.

I might make a diagram to make this a whole lot easier to explain.
ARK: Survival Evolved's Ragnarok PS4 release is delayed until August 29th. My school year starts on August 21st.

On 7/26/2017 at 2:32 PM, StupidAndy said:

I am trying to do the "hello world" tutorial for C#, but I keep getting stuck on stupid Microsoft Visual Studio, I want to do something, it doesn't even do the wrong thing! it wont do anything!!!

if anyone has a clue on how to work Visual Studio, please help me...

I do. What's giving you trouble? (says the guy who had a 4-inch thick guidebook from the very start)

As for the complaint, I can't texture, so my Kopernicus Planet can't be shown.

If anyone wants to offer any tips, I should put some info out there. It will be a perfectly flat minmus clone, position at about 35 Mm from kerbin, meant to be used for Ion Fun.

 

Edited July 29, 2017 by DeltaDizzy

I am being given two more areas in work to clean and at the same time having my hours reduced.... but they want the same standards maintained.

They already complain but I cannot physically do any more.

Employers logic.

So, they dropped the power at work three times this morning. At lunchtime I was driving down the main drag in town and had to swerve around some moron who decided to shove the nose of their car into traffic. This moron then decided that they were angry at me and followed me around road raging at me for two or three minutes. Now I get back to work and facilities is doing fire alarm testing, which means that the fire alarms will be going off at random intervals all afternoon.

Did you ever feel like you just want to get away?

I hate my brain.

This is 10th night and 9th day I am not sleeping.

Like the only time I actually slept was like an hour when I dropped dead on th coach.

What

The

Hell

1 hour ago, cratercracker said:

This is 10th night and 9th day I am not sleeping.

I've been an insomniac my entire life, yeah it's horrible. But this is worse than I've ever had!

Is melatonin commercially available where you live? In the US you can buy it over the counter (that is, no medical prescription required), but here in Brazil it's not available at all. Which is a shame, really, I've tried it and IT WAS MAGIC (well, to me at least. I guess "sleeping" is something regular humans don't have problems with, so they wouldn't know what the fuss is about )

Usually, doing really boring stuff like watching boring videos on YouTube helps quite alot. But since my Ipad was not charged well enough that night. I was laying there all night, in the dark, thinking about stuff.

Also, i hate when people i am a dumb idiot living living in their Moms basement. Im sorry, but im actually a dumb idiot living in their Moms ATTIC (ok sorry for the lame joke but i do spend alot of my time in the attic since its my bedroom.

Also there is someone going through my steam workshop items, voting them down and posting negative comments. http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1095169592

I enjoy making the repaints and have decided to not do as they ask and stop making workshop downloads, instead I am now working on an ambulance skin set to go with the police themed repaints I made.
